alert.note: Alert for Lake; Obion (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Obion and southeastern Lake Counties through 415 PM CDT... At 345 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Reelfoot Lake State Park, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reelfoot Lake State Park, Tiptonville, Hornbeak, Samburg, Wynnburg, Madie, Mooring, Haynes, Roneys Store, Elbridge, Sunkist Beach, Lassiter Corner, Gratio, Blue Bank, Keefe, Minnick and Jacksonville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
